subject: Re: [sugar] Errors sugar build
body:
Now i have [gonzalo@porte sugar-jhbuild]$ ./sugar-jhbuild buildChecking dependencies...Missing dependencies:xulrunner/firefox 1.8/1.9You know what package i must install in FC6?
[root@porte sugar-tuquito]# yum list "xul*"Loading "installonlyn" plugin
Setting up repositories
Reading repository metadata in from local files[root@porte sugar-tuquito]# yum list "fire*"
Loading "installonlyn" pluginSetting up repositories
Reading repository metadata in from local files
Installed Packagesfirefox.i386                             1.5.0.10-5.fc6         installed       
Available Packagesfirefox-devel.i386                       1.5.0.10-5.fc6
         updates         firestarter.i386                         1.0.3-14.fc6           extras          
[root@porte sugar-tuquito]# yum list "moz*"Loading "installonlyn" plugin

Reading repository metadata in from local filesAvailable Packages

6.0.3-1.fc6            extras          mozldap-tools.i386                       6.0.3-1.fc6            extras          
mozplugger.i386                          1.7.3-3.1              core            
GonzaloOn 4/29/07, Marco Pesenti Gritti <mpg@redhat.com> wrote:
On Sun, 2007-04-29 at 20:00 -0300, Gonzalo Odiard wrote:> I thinks there are the following errors in  the actual sugar build:> hippo-canvas is compiled before pygtk (depends only fom gtk+ ?)>Good catch! I checked in a fix.
> telepathy-glib is compiled before dbus-glibRight, I checked in a fix for this this afternoon.Marco
